meanings.definition: A compound containing a silicon-oxygen bond.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the siloxane under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Siloxane is commonly used in the production of silicone sealants.
meanings.sent3: The siloxane molecule threw a party with oxygen and silicon atoms.
meanings.sent4: The bond between silicon and oxygen in siloxane is as strong as a superhero's shield.
meanings.sent5: When you mix silicon and oxygen, you get the magical compound known as siloxane.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of compounds containing a silicon-oxygen-silicon bond.
meanings.sent1: The company specializes in the production of various siloxanes for industrial use.
meanings.sent2: Siloxanes are essential components in many skincare products.
meanings.sent3: At the silicon party, the siloxane was the life of the bonding event.
meanings.sent4: The siloxane bond is like a bridge connecting silicon atoms across the oxygen river.
meanings.sent5: In the world of chemistry, siloxanes play a crucial role in many applications.
